original: BASIC PROVISIONS 1. Joint Content License Relationship . Among other games, Zynga produces and distributes the ZYNGA POKER® game on a number of global platforms, including Apple iOS, Google Android, Facebook and the zynga.com website. The ZYNGA POKER® game features a Zynga Poker Tournaments Mode that Zynga can customize. Among other things, WPT is the creator of the World Poker Tour, WPT Tournaments and the WPT Invitational Tournaments. WPT Tournaments and WPT Invitational Tournaments are televised poker tournaments where a partner can promote its brand. The parties desire to work cooperatively, but independently, to use commercially reasonable efforts to engage in the marketing and promotional activities described in Exhibit A, including, but not limited to Zynga promoting the WPT brand in a WPT-branded Zynga Poker Tournament Mode, and WPT promoting the Zynga brand in WPT Tournaments and WPT Invitational Tournaments. This Agreement describes the terms of a content license and cooperative marketing relationship under which each party will independently or cooperatively engage in mutually agreed activities to promote each other’s products and services throughout the Territory (as defined below).
ollama_generated:
CORE PROVISIONS: 1. Collaborative Content Licensing Arrangement

In its portfolio, Zynga develops and disseminates the ZYNGA POKER® game across several international platforms, such as Apple iOS, Google Android, Facebook, and zynga.com. The ZYNGA POKER® game incorporates a Zynga Poker Tournaments Mode that Zynga retains the flexibility to modify. Notably, WPT is recognized for creating the World Poker Tour, WPT Tournaments, and WPT Invitational Tournaments. These televised poker tournaments offer an opportunity for partners to enhance their brand visibility. With a shared goal of collaboration, yet maintaining independent operations, this Agreement outlines our efforts to act in good faith when executing marketing and promotional activities as outlined in Exhibit A. This may include Zynga showcasing the WPT brand within a WPT-branded Zynga Poker Tournament Mode, and WPT displaying the Zynga brand during WPT Tournaments and WPT Invitational Tournaments. This Agreement sets forth the terms of a content license and cooperative marketing arrangement, whereby each party will independently or collaboratively engage in mutually agreed activities to support each other's products and services within the defined Territory (as specified below), recognizing that each party is ultimately responsible for achieving its own promotional objectives.

original: Source: ALLIED ESPORTS ENTERTAINMENT, INC., 8-K, 8/15/2019 IN WITNESS WHEREOF ZYNGA INC.
ollama_generated:
In the event of any contradiction or inconsistency between this disclosure and any other document or agreement related to Allied Esports Entertainment, Inc., it shall be resolved in favor of the interpretation that places the least obligation on Zynga Inc. Herein, we affirm that this resolution is binding under oath by both parties involved in the aforementioned documents or agreements dated August 15, 2019.

In essence, in any dispute arising from the conflicting terms, the interpretation favoring lesser obligations for Zynga Inc shall prevail. This understanding applies mutually to all related parties engaged in documented transactions as of the stipulated date.

Signature: ______________________ Name: _________________________ Title: __________________________ Recipient's Name and Title

To clarify our mutually beneficial agreement, it is understood that the Recipient's Name and Title shall assume all responsibilities and liabilities arising from this contract. WPT Enterprises, Inc. shall have no obligations or duties beyond those expressly stated herein. This transfer of responsibilities is reciprocal, with WPT Enterprises, Inc. releasing itself from any claims that may arise from the actions or omissions of the Recipient's Name and Title, subject to applicable law.

In this agreement, it is expressly understood that the Recipient's Name and Title shall bear all risks associated with the performance of their obligations under this contract. WPT Enterprises, Inc. will not be held responsible for any losses, damages, or costs incurred by the Recipient's Name and Title as a result of their actions or omissions in fulfilling their duties under this agreement. This waiver of liability is granted subject to the provisions of applicable law.

In the event that the Recipient's Name and Title fails to meet their obligations under this contract, WPT Enterprises, Inc. reserves the right to terminate this agreement immediately without liability. The Recipient's Name and Title acknowledges and accepts these terms.

WPT Enterprises, Inc.
By: ______________________
Name: _________________________
Title: __________________________

original: e. “Annual Minimum Guarantee ” means the guaranteed minimum amount due to WPT by Zynga in consideration of the rights granted herein, which amount may be recoupable from Royalties as set forth below and in the Basic Provisions.
modified: d. "Annual Minimum Guarantee" denotes the smallest assured amount payable by Zynga to WPT as remuneration for the rights conferred herein, which minimum payment may not exceed the sum receivable as Royalties, as stipulated below and in the Fundamental Provisions. In this context, any excess Royalties shall not be repayable to WPT.

original: h. “Territory ” means the territory throughout which the parties are authorized to engage in the marketing and promotional activities as described in Exhibit A and in the Basic Provisions.
ollama_generated:
Clause:
h. "Territory" denotes the geographical expanse, within which either party retains the discretionary authority to undertake marketing and promotional activities, in accordance with Exhibit A and the Fundamental Provisions, but without any obligation or compulsion to do so.

original: b. License by Zynga . Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, Zynga grants to WPT a non-exclusive, non- assignable, non-sublicensable, royalty-free, paid up, limited worldwide license to use and display Zynga’s Licensed Property solely as necessary to perform WPT’s obligations under this Agreement and as specifically described on Exhibit A, in any and all media now known or hereafter devised, for the Term (subject to Section 7.e. of Additional Provisions).
ollama_generated: a. License Granted by WPT: Under the provisions of this Agreement, WPT grants to Zynga a non-exclusive, transferable, sublicensable, royalty-bearing, remunerated, limited worldwide license to use and exhibit Zynga’s Licensed Property, solely for purposes as specified in Exhibit A, in any and all media presently existing or developed in the future, during the Term (with exception of Section 7.e. of Additional Provisions). This grant of license is conditioned upon Zynga's requirement to fulfill its obligations under this Agreement.

original: iii.Zynga shall advise WPT to Zynga’s knowledge as to which jurisdictions where it may be illegal to advertise Zynga’s Licensed Property (if any) given local laws or regulations.

However, it is solely Zynga's obligation to ensure compliance with all applicable laws and regulations in these jurisdictions.

original: f. Reservation of Rights . The parties acknowledge and agree that, except for the rights and licenses expressly granted by each party to the other party under this Agreement, each party will retain all right, title and interest in and to its products, services, marks, copyrights or other intellectual property, and all content, information and other materials on its website(s), and nothing contained in this Agreement will be construed as conferring upon such party, by implication, operation of law or otherwise, any other license or other right.
ollama_generated: g. Retention of Exclusive Rights . The parties acknowledge and consent that, beyond the rights and permissions explicitly conferred by one party to the other under this Agreement, each party maintains sole ownership, title, and authority over their respective products, services, trademarks, copyrights, or any other intellectual property, as well as all content, information, and materials found on their websites. It is clearly stated that this Agreement does not imply, by implication, law, or otherwise, the transfer of any additional license or right to another party.

original: b. Royalty . The Royalties to be paid by Zynga to WPT is the percentage of Net Revenue as set forth in Section 5 of the Basic Provisions. “ Net Revenue(s) ” shall be defined as one hundred percent (100%) of gross revenues and all other receivables of any kind whatsoever received by Zynga or any of Zynga’s affiliates attributable to the use of Paid Currency or in connection with the sale of Virtual Digital Goods derived from use of the WPT-brand on the Zynga platform, less the following actual and verifiable “Allowable Deductions ”: (i) out-of-pocket, third-party payment processing and currency system fees, commissions, and platform distribution fees (e.g., Apple, Google or Facebook platform fees); (ii) any governmental taxes (e.g., VAT, excise or sales or use tax, etc.) arising in connection with related receipts, but excluding any taxes on Licensee’s net income; and (iii) charge- backs/refunds/cancellations/fraud. “ Paid Currency ” means virtual currency purchased using real money. “ Virtual Digital Goods ” means any virtual, digital representation of any actual or fictional thing or item within Zynga Poker, which is capable of being made available for distribution, placement, download or other display by electronic means. Any other deductions must be mutually agreed upon in advance and in writing by the parties.
ollama_generated: a. Royalties Owed: The royalties that WPT shall receive from Zynga will correspond to the percentage of Gross Income as specified in Section 5 of the Fundamental Terms. "Gross Income(s)" shall be defined as one hundred percent (100%) of all revenues and receivables of any nature whatsoever received by Zynga or any of its affiliates, stemming from the use of Real Currency or in association with the sale of Virtual Digital Items resulting from the utilization of the WPT trademark on the Zynga platform. The following deductions shall be allowed as justifiable expenses: (i) third-party payment processing and currency system fees, commissions, and platform distribution fees (e.g., Apple, Google or Facebook charges); (ii) any governmental taxes (e.g., VAT, excise or sales or use tax, etc.) associated with these receipts, but excluding taxes on the licensee's net income; and (iii) charge-backs/refunds/cancellations/fraud. "Real Currency" denotes currency exchanged for real money. "Virtual Digital Items" represent any virtual, digital depictions of real or fictional items within Zynga Poker, which can be distributed, placed, downloaded or otherwise displayed electronically. Any additional deductions must be agreed upon in writing and in advance by both parties, with the understanding that they do not exceed the amount mutually agreed upon.

original: Source: ALLIED ESPORTS ENTERTAINMENT, INC., 8-K, 8/15/2019 c. Payment . All amounts payable and due will be made in U.S. dollars. If withholding taxes are required, Zynga may account for the required amount of such withholding taxes when calculating the Royalty or other payments payable prior to remittance to WPT.
modified:
Clause:
Adjusted Payment Provisions:
As stated in ALLIED ESPORTS ENTERTAINMENT, INC., 8-K dated 8/15/2019 (Section: Payment), all sums payable and owed will be settled in U.S. dollars. However, it is noted that WPT is responsible for withholding any applicable taxes, should they arise. Zynga shall not account for the aforementioned withholding taxes while computing the Royalty or other payments. Instead, these payments will be calculated and remitted in full to WPT prior to any tax deductions.

original: d. Reporting . Zynga will, within thirty (30) days of the end of each calendar quarter, commencing with the first full calendar quarter following the Effective Date, furnish WPT with complete statements containing the following information with respect to all Net Revenue from the use of the WPT-brand on the Zynga platform, during the preceding period covered by such statement: the Territory; the amount due WPT (or the remaining unrecouped Annual Minimum Guarantee balance as applicable); Net Revenue; Royalties rate; the distribution channels or portals, the platform, the territory(ies), and itemized Allowable Deductions (“ Royalty Statement(s) ”). The amount shown to be payable to WPT shall be paid simultaneously with the rendition of the respective Royalty Statement. The statements and payments remitted hereunder shall be delivered to WPT via email to the following email address: Deborah.Frazzetta@wpt.com  (ATTN: Deborah Frazzetta, VP, Finance.
ollama_generated: d. Reporting and Payment Obligations . WPT will require Zynga to submit, within thirty (30) days following the commencement of each calendar quarter, complete statements regarding all Net Revenue generated from the use of the Zynga-brand on the WPT platform, for the preceding period covered by such statement. The information to be included in these statements shall include: the Territory; any amounts owed by WPT (or the remaining unrecouped Annual Minimum Guarantee balance as applicable); Net Revenue; Royalties rate; the distribution channels or portals, the platform, the territory(ies), and itemized Allowable Deductions ("Royalty Statement(s)"). Zynga will be responsible for making any payments owed to WPT, in accordance with the amount shown on each respective Royalty Statement, at a later date following the submission of the statements. The submitted Royalty Statements and any corresponding payments shall be sent to an email address provided by WPT, which may include Deborah.Frazzetta@wpt.com (ATTN: Deborah Frazzetta, VP, Finance). This process will commence with the first full calendar quarter following the Effective Date.

original: If the adjustment is more than $1,500 in favor, then out-of-pocket costs of such examination shall be borne by Zynga.
modified: Should the adjustment result in an amount exceeding $1,500 against the Client, Zynga will assume responsibility for covering any out-of-pocket expenses related to the examination in question.

original: f. No Other Charges or Expenses . Neither party will be liable to pay the other party any other types of charges or expenses not agreed to in this Agreement or any related amendment signed by the Parties.
ollama_generated: g. Incidental Costs and Fees. Each Party shall only be responsible for incidental costs or fees explicitly outlined in this Agreement or any subsequent amendments duly executed by both Parties, with no other obligations to incur or reimburse such expenses without express agreement.

original: d. Notwithstanding any termination of this Agreement, nothing herein will obligate Zynga, any users of a Zynga game that includes WPT’s Licensed Property or any third party platform or distribution partners to remove from the publicly available content regarding Zynga services or any user accounts with Zynga, any of the references to user interactions, experience points, achievements, item purchases or other engagements or metrics in the Zynga game(s) that were generated prior to the expiration or termination of this Agreement.

This clause does not imply an obligation on the part of these parties to add new references or metrics post-termination or expiration.

original: b. Counterparts . This Agreement may be executed in any number of counterparts, each of which shall be an original and all of which shall constitute together but one and the same document.
ollama_generated: a. Multiple Executions . This Agreement can be signed individually by each party in multiple separate copies, with each such signed copy being considered an original. All signed copies combined will form a single, unified document, collectively binding both parties.

original: f. Force Majeure . In the event that either party is prevented from engaging in the marketing and promotional activities in Exhibit A manufacturing, distributing or selling the Licensed Property because of any act of God; unavoidable accident; fire, epidemic; strike, lockout, or other labor dispute; war, riot or civil commotion; act of public enemy; enactment of any rule, law, order or act of government or governmental instrumentality (whether federal, state, local or foreign); or other cause beyond such party’s control, and such condition continues for a period of two (2) months or more, either party hereto shall have the right to terminate this Agreement effective at any time during the continuation of such condition by giving the other party at least thirty (30) days’ notice to such effect. In such event, all payments made shall become immediately due and payable and this Agreement shall be automatically terminated.
ollama_generated: g. Unforeseen Circumstances. If either party encounters an impediment in the execution of marketing, promotion, manufacturing, distribution, or sale of the Licensed Property as a result of any unforeseen event such as acts of nature, catastrophes, fires, disease outbreaks, work stoppages due to reasons other than negligence (including strikes, lockouts, or labor disputes), war, public disturbances, actions of hostile entities, or legislative actions, and this impediment persists for a duration of two (2) consecutive months or more, either party has the discretion to terminate this Agreement. Upon such termination, any payments made under this agreement shall immediately become payable in full, and the termination will be effective from the date of notification provided to the other party, which must be at least thirty (30) days prior. In this case, the remaining obligations under this Agreement shall be waived, except for the obligation to settle any outstanding payments promptly upon notice of termination.

original: g. Governing Law and Forum . This Agreement will for all purposes be governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of the State of California without giving effect to any conflict of laws principles that require the application of the laws of a different state. Each of the parties hereto (i) irrevocably agrees that the federal and state courts in the Northern District of California shall have sole and exclusive jurisdiction over any suit or other proceeding arising out of or based upon this Agreement, (ii) submits to the venue and jurisdiction of such courts, and (iii) irrevocably consents to personal jurisdiction by such courts.
ollama_generated: h. Jurisdiction and Applicable Law . This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of California, giving precedence to its local laws over any conflicting legislation from other jurisdictions. Each party (i) hereby acknowledges their consent to submit to the non-exclusive jurisdiction of the federal and state courts located within the Northern District of California for any disputes arising under or in connection with this Agreement, (ii) agrees that such courts shall retain the right to hear these disputes, and (iii) waives any objection, now or later, to the venue or personal jurisdiction of these courts.

original: i. Severability . In case any one or more of the terms contained in this Agreement shall be invalid, illegal or unenforceable in any respect, the validity, legality and enforceability of the remaining terms shall not in any way be affected or impaired thereby. The parties shall endeavor in good faith negotiations to replace the invalid, illegal or unenforceable terms with valid terms the economic effect of which comes as close as possible to that of the invalid, illegal or unenforceable terms.
modified: i. Non-severability Clause. In the event that any provision within this Agreement is deemed invalid, illegal, or unenforceable in any respect, the entire agreement shall be null and void, and all parties will promptly initiate good faith negotiations to reach a mutually acceptable revised agreement that addresses the issue while preserving, to the greatest extent possible, the original intent and economic effect of the voided provision.
